validation.command: rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_4_check cargo check -p frankenengine-node --all-targets
rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_4_clippy cargo clippy -p frankenengine-node --all-targets -- -D warnings
rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_4_bulkhead_tests cargo test -p frankenengine-node --bin frankenengine-node runtime::bulkhead::tests -- --nocapture
rch exec -- env CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target/rch_bd17z7_4_lane_router_tests cargo test -p frankenengine-node --bin frankenengine-node runtime::lane_router::tests -- --nocapture

notes: Release now verifies permit-to-operation ownership before mutating in-flight counters.
Permit-operation mismatches fail closed and preserve permit state until correct release arrives.
